settings.html: Introducing the Dell Precision 3660 Tower Workstation, purpose-built to empower radiologists with the ultimate computing solution for their critical tasks. This workstation is meticulously designed to meet the unique demands of the field, offering unparalleled performance and precision. With advanced graphics capabilities, lightning-fast processing power, and seamless connectivity, the Dell Precision 3660 is the ideal companion for radiologists, ensuring efficient handling of complex medical imaging applications.

settings.title: Unparalleled Performance
settings.description: Experience top-tier performance with the Dell Precision 3660 Tower Desktop Workstation. It boasts the latest Intel 13th and 14th Gen Core i-series processors, including the i7 and i9, supporting up to 24 cores. These processors are meticulously designed to deliver exceptional multitasking efficiency and lightning-fast data processing. Radiologists can rely on this powerhouse for seamless operations, ensuring precise and timely medical diagnoses with the utmost confidence. The remarkable processing capabilities of the Intel Core i-series set a new standard in performance, making the workstation an ideal choice for professionals who demand excellence. Elevate your workflow and experience unparalleled speed and reliability with the Dell Precision 3660 Tower Desktop Workstation.

settings.title: Customization Options
settings.description: The Dell Precision 3660 Workstation Tower, designed to meet the specific needs of radiologists with unparalleled performance and connectivity. This workstation offers a range of high-performance options, including AMD Radeon Pro and Barco MXRT graphics cards. With the capacity for storage up to 512GB NVMe SSD, radiologists can efficiently manage their demanding imaging applications. At its core, the Precision 3660 features Intel Core i series processors, ranging from the 13th to 14th generation, with up to 24 cores and clock speeds of up to 5.80GHz. This processing power ensures that radiologists can handle complex tasks with ease. Furthermore, integrated Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 with vPro guarantee fast and reliable wireless connectivity, allowing radiologists to stay connected and productive. Featuring a spacious storage capacity, the Dell 3660 offers a front-accessible 3.5" or 2.5" HDD storage option, as well as a front-accessible M.2 NVMe SSD slot for fast and efficient data access. This workstation also includes an optional optical drive for added convenience. In summary, the Dell Precision 3660 Workstation Tower is the ultimate choice for radiologists seeking a powerful, efficient, and connected solution to tackle their imaging tasks.

settings.title: Reliability You Can Trust
settings.description: Reliability and sustainability stand as paramount considerations for radiologists, and the Dell 3660 Workstation Tower admirably excels on both fronts. Rigorously MIL-STD tested for reliability, this workstation instills confidence in its robust performance. Further ensuring its prowess, the system boasts ISV certifications for both performance and reliability, attesting to its compatibility with industry standards. The inclusion of ECC memory enhances data integrity, a critical facet in medical imaging tasks where precision is non-negotiable. Going beyond performance, the workstation is also EPEAT registered, a testament to its commitment to sustainability. Through the utilization of eco-friendly materials in its construction, the Dell 3660 Workstation Tower not only meets high-performance demands but also aligns with environmentally conscious practices, making it a conscientious choice for discerning professionals.

settings.title: Dell 3660 Tower Desktop Workstation: Precision Graphics for Radiologists
settings.description: Elevate your visual experience with remarkable clarity and uncompromising graphics performance, thanks to The Dell Precision 3660 Tower Desktop Workstation. You have the option of selecting between NVIDIA Quadro or AMD Radeon Pro GPUs, along with Barco MXRT GPUs, allowing for up to Quad GPUs configuration. Whether you're analyzing intricate medical images or performing other critical diagnostic tasks, the Dell Precision 3660 Workstation Tower ensures unparalleled precision for radiologists and medical imaging professionals. This multi-GPU capability further enhances your ability to work with high-resolution medical images and complex datasets, providing you with the tools needed for precise diagnosis and research in the field of radiology.

settings.title: High-Performance Processors
settings.description: The Dell Precision 3660 Tower boasts an array of Intel Core i-Series 13th and 14th generation processors, offering up to 24 cores and speeds of up to 5.80 GHz. This lineup includes the i7, and i9 models, presenting radiologists with versatile choices to align with their specific requirements. These processors are meticulously engineered to provide both exceptional performance and efficiency, accommodating a wide range of radiological tasks. Whether you seek dependable computing power for routine image analysis or demand high-performance capabilities for intricate medical imaging and diagnostics, the Dell Precision 3660 Tower 's Intel Core i-Series processors ensure that you possess the essential processing capabilities needed for your radiology practice.

settings.title: High-Velocity DDR5 Memory
settings.description: This advanced workstation is equipped with high-speed DDR5 memory, offering a substantial capacity of up to 128GB. This impressive RAM allocation is specifically tailored for handling data-intensive medical imaging tasks with efficiency and precision. The rapid memory speed guarantees seamless management of extensive datasets, allowing healthcare professionals to navigate through complex information without delays. Not only does this enhance overall productivity, but it also contributes to a more streamlined workflow. The DDR5 memory not only meets the demanding requirements of medical imaging but also operates with reduced power consumption, aligning with sustainable practices. With its robust memory configuration, this workstation empowers healthcare professionals by providing a reliable and powerful platform for their critical tasks in medical diagnostics and analysis.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling Efficiency
settings.description:
The Dell Precision 3660 Workstation Tower is equipped with advanced thermals that keep your system cool and quiet, even when running demanding radiology applications. This means that you can focus on providing the best possible care for your patients without having to worry about your workstation overheating or making a lot of noise.

The Precision 3660's advanced thermals include a high-performance CPU air cooler, a strategically placed intake and exhaust fan system, and a dust filter. These features work together to efficiently dissipate heat from your system, preventing thermal throttling and ensuring that your workstation can always perform at its best.

Whether you're reviewing medical images, diagnosing diseases, or developing treatment plans, you can be confident that the Dell Precision 3660 Workstation Tower will stay cool and quiet, so you can focus on your patients without any distractions.

settings.title: Dell Optimizer
settings.description:
With Dell Optimizer for Precision, this workstation is equipped with intelligent features that adapt to your workflow, optimizing performance and enhancing user experience. Dell Optimizer revolutionizes the PC screen based on user behavior, ensuring a personalized and efficient working environment.

The Dell 3660 Workstation Tower is a powerful and reliable solution designed specifically for radiologists. With its intelligent performance, ample storage options, and advanced connectivity, it provides the ideal platform for efficient and accurate medical imaging tasks.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The Dell 3660 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

1. Height: 369 mm (14.52")

2. Width: 173 mm (6.81")

3. Depth: 420 mm (16.53")

Weight: 8.5 kg (18.7 lbs)

settings.title: Front View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 3660 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

1. 3.5" or 2.5" front-accessible HDD storage option, lockable

2. Optional Optical drive

3. Power button

4. Audio-mic combo (3.5mm) jack

5. USB 3.2 Type-A Gen 1 (5Gbps) (x2)

6. USB 3.2 Type-C Gen2 (10Gbps) data only

7. USB 3.2 Type-C Gen 2x2 (20Gbps) data only

8. SD Card Reader 4.0

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
9. Audio out (3.5mm jack)

10. DP1.4++ HBR2 (x2)

11.USB 3.2 Type-C Gen2 (10Gbps) with power delivery (x2)

12. USB 3.2 Type-A Gen2 (10Gbps) (x2)

13. USB 2.0 Type-A (x2)

14. RJ45 i219 LAN (1G)

15. Power connector

16. LED indicator light

17. Video port optional:
(VGA HD15, HDMI 2.0, DP++ 1.4 HBR3, USB Type-C w/DP-Alt mode DP 1.4 HBR2)

settings.title: Exceptional Service & Support from Monitors.com
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier workstation but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:
Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
